page.title: 20 COUNCILS.
page.content: The District Council is responsible for housing and planning. The County Council looks after education, roads police and the fire service. They both collect rates. The District Council meets once a month. Mrs. Della Jones is our District Councillor and our County Councillor.She sits on a lot of committees. The elections for the councils are every four years, and everyboby over eighteen can vote. The biggest problem is finding jobs for people. The North Dorset District Council has trouble with some flies which breed in the river and bite people. The District Council meets in Blandford and the Council meets in Dorchester.
